text: all right today we're doing guacamole
with avocado and if you read the post on
the site you'll understand what that

ripe avocados a couple green onions just
the white parts a lime a jalapeno pepper
a little bit of cayenne and about a half
a bunch of fresh cilantro now the only
controversy here whether there should be
lime in guacamole I don't use tomato and
again I'm gonna explain that on the
website so here we go if you don't know
here's how you clean an avocado or a
break down an avocado you're gonna find
the top or go right through the middle
of the top and the knife will actually
hit the pit and then if you give it a
twist see that was so easy and again
really really easy if they're ripe okay
so just cut right through the center the
knife will hit the pit you can't screw
it up and then just give them the nut a
little tap with the knife it will stick
give it a little turn
voila all right I don't know what

out all that beautiful ripe green flesh
and that's gonna start our avocado laced

right now alright so put those in a bowl

don't try to pull it off cuz you'll

you see a couple little brown spots
don't worry that's okay

salt really important to bring out the
